archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Authorize Outbound Party Payment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Obtain authorization to make the payment to the party from a party who is capable of doing so.

properties.value: Authorize Outbound Party Payment obtain authorization to make the payment to the party from a party who is capable of doing so. Lists of those responsible for authorizing outbound payments are managed by the applicable Process Management & Support process in the Enterprise domain which maintains the association between parties playing a variety of roles and the processes in which they are involved.
